dublinCore.dc:title: 113 S2395 IS: To repeal the Authorization for Use of Military Force Against Iraq Resolution of 2002.
dublinCore.dc:rights: Pursuant to Title 17 Section 105 of the United States Code, this file is not subject to copyright protection and is in the public domain.

form.current-chamber: IN THE SENATE OF THE UNITED STATES

action.action-desc: Mr. Menendez (for himself, Mrs. Boxer, Mr. Kaine, and Mr. Cardin) introduced the following bill; which was read twice and referred to the Committee on Foreign Relations

form.official-title: To repeal the Authorization for Use of Military Force Against Iraq Resolution of 2002.

section.header: Repeal of Authorization for Use of Military Force Against Iraq
section.text: The Authorization for Use of Military Force Against Iraq Resolution of 2002 (Public Law 107â€“243; 116 Stat. 1498; 50 U.S.C. 1541 note) is hereby repealed.
